alert.note: Alert for Atoka; Coal; Hughes (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 23 at 9:21PM CDT until September 23 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Coal County in southeastern Oklahoma... Northeastern Atoka County in southeastern Oklahoma... Southeastern Hughes County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 921 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southwest of Ashland, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Stringtown, Wardville, Daisy, Atoka Reservoir, Redden, Chockie, and northern McGee Creek Lake. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.
